title: Mourner (Mourner Tunnels)

properties.value: Mourners are encountered in the Mourner Tunnels during the Mourning's End quests. Unlike other mourners, they are entirely non-interactive and cannot be fought or spoken to. They can be distinguished from other mourners by the Crystal halberds they wield, and their slightly lighter clothing.

Mourners are encountered in the Mourner Tunnels during the Mourning's End quests. Unlike other mourners, they are entirely non-interactive and cannot be fought or spoken to. They can be distinguished from other mourners by the Crystal halberds they wield, and their slightly lighter clothing.

One mourner can be found guarding the entrance to the room where the Gnome is being tortured. Two more mourners can be found in the tunnels, disciplining the slaves.

[[File:Mourner (Mourner Tunnels) chathead.png|left]]
'''Mourners''' are encountered in the [[Mourner Tunnels]] during the Mourning's End quests. Unlike other mourners, they are entirely non-interactive and cannot be fought or spoken to. They can be distinguished from other mourners by the [[Crystal halberd]]s they wield, and their slightly lighter clothing.

One mourner can be found guarding the entrance to the room where the [[Gnome (Mourner Headquarters)|Gnome]] is being tortured. Two more mourners can be found in the tunnels, disciplining the slaves.

{{Mourning's End Part II}}
